definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: A shop assistance hung it on a rack or placed it on a table with many others.
sentences.chinese: 店員把它掛到貨架上，或與其它東西一起擺到桌子上。

sentences.english: Comes mounted on Nomad 2 shelf, with pre-wired fuse.
sentences.chinese: 來自遊牧2貨架上，與前有線保險絲。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低溫加熱滅菌可在一定程度上延長滷牛肉的貨架期。

sentences.english: A coolie grabbed a handful of penicillin from a shelf.
sentences.chinese: 有一個苦力從貨架上抓了幾盒青黴素。

sentences.english: The shelves in the supermarket is full of items before the Christmas rush.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕爭購熱潮前超市市場的貨架堆滿了商品。

sentences.english: The snack aisles in supermarkets are very big and have lots of choices.
sentences.chinese: 超市裏放零食的貨架很大，意味着可選擇的種類很多。

sentences.english: I saw it on the rack.
Guest:Um, i want to buy some pickle cucumber , which shelf does it place?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想買點醬黃瓜，但是我不知道它在那一排貨架？

sentences.english: Made in China gets put right back on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 中國製造的，直接扔回貨架。

sentences.english: Stock food items neat in shelves and fridges.
sentences.chinese: 把食品整齊擺放在貨架上和冰箱內。

sentences.english: Cantilever racking is mainly used in the Mechanical Manufacturing Industry and markets for building materials.
sentences.chinese: 此類貨架多用於機械製造行業和建材超市等。

sentences.english: Often familiar Ming ocean business enterprise in Jiangsu is a profession to be engaged in to place a thing and supermarket shelf Factory house of produce.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇常熟銘洋企業專業從事置物架和超市貨架的廠家。

sentences.english: They could be filled up with shelves of an antic look or some modern contemporary design.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以填滿與貨架上的一個抗或看一些現當代設計。

sentences.english: He set the stands of fresh fruit at the entrance of the store.
sentences.chinese: 他把新鮮水果貨架擺在店堂門口。

sentences.english: Higher shelves and rods provide places for out-of-season clothing.
sentences.chinese: 更高的貨架可以爲過季服裝提供安放場所。

sentences.english: Type, gravity-such as light, medium and heavy shelves.
sentences.chinese: 動式，自流式等各種輕，中，重型貨架。

definition: to set up/to arrange/to lay out
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
